an interesting fact about  @ amazon if you purchase a  # mobilephone from  # amazon ,  they do not provide an  # imei number on the invoice ,  are unwilling to do so & you are unable to get  # insurance this information is required on purchase paperwork to obtain insurance .  an imei stands for international mobile equipment identity .  think of it as your phone ' s fingerprint — it ' s a 15 - digit number unique to each device .  phone carriers and manufacturers share imei numbers to enable tracking of smartphones that may be stolen or compromised . 	40,41 AFTER-SALES.SERVICE#EXCHANGE/WARRANTY/RETURN 0 36,39

the phones no longer come with a power plug  /  adapter ,  so either plug the lightening cable into an adapter from another phone or tablet or plug it into a usb port on a pc ,  mac or laptop .  some wall and trailing sockets have usb power outlets built in and you can use that to charge your iphone too .  failing all of that ,  buy a plug in charger with usb .  you use the lightening cable in the usual way to charge your phone .  you plug it into the base of the phone to charge it and / or transfer data .  one end goes in the connection at the bottom of the phone the other goes into a usb socket i use it only for charging	7,11 PRODUCT.ACCESSORIES#CHARGER 0 2,6

i had this phone for all of a week .  at that point it slipped out of my pocket while i was bending over and fell about a foot or 2 to the ground ,  with a screen protector on .  the screen shattered right across the bottom of the phone .  waste of  ? 300 this phone has a fundamental design flaw  -  the screen glass ,  in addition to being very weak ,  curves right over the edges of the phone  -  this means that if it gets any kind of knock on the corners it puts the glass under stress .  the screen protector cannot protect these parts of the screen  ( which are more likely to get knocked .  i could only recommend this phone if kept in a fully immersive case else it ' s not going to last .  the pixel 3a was a far more robust model . 	37,38 SCREEN#GENERAL 0 43,44	65,67 SCREEN#GENERAL 0 72,74	152,153 PRODUCT.QUALITY#FALL.PROTECTION 2 117,118
